official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require health maintenance organizations under the medicare program to determine whether individuals enrolled with the organization are entitled to medical assistance for medicare cost-sharing under a State medicaid plan.
short_title: Medicare HMO Qualified Medicare Beneficiary Notification Act of 1991

summary.text: Medicare HMO Qualified Medicare Beneficiary Notification Act of 1991 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require health maintenance organizations that are participating in the Medicare program and that are parties to specified risk-sharing contracts to determine whether individuals enrolled with such organizations are entitled to medical assistance for Medicare cost-sharing under title XIX (Medicaid) and to assist them in obtaining such assistance.

titles.title: Medicare HMO Qualified Medicare Beneficiary Notification Act of 1991

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require health maintenance organizations under the medicare program to determine whether individuals enrolled with the organization are entitled to medical assistance for medicare cost-sharing under a State medicaid plan.
